title: Ditching Dualism #10: Determinism
content: One major hangup in subscribing to a physics-based universe of material monism is that it appears to remove human agency as typically conceived in our culture. If atoms and their interactions are making everything happen, abiding by rules they (or we) cannot violate, is there any room left for human intervention or free will?
creator: Tom Murphy
sourceDescription: Insight and inspiration in turbulent times.

title: Crazy Town: Episode 118. Choose your AI Adventure: Immiseration or Extinction
content: Jason and Asher replace Rob with a much more humane and humble co-host, Elon Musk, to explore the feasibility of harnessing the entire sun to power AI superintelligence. We come away perplexed that not much of the excellent reporting on the environmental, energy, and financial risks of the AI boom address the googleplex-sized elephant in the room – that both AI success and failure lead to immiseration.
creator: Asher Miller
sourceDescription: Insight and inspiration in turbulent times.

title: The Being Way of Degrowth
content: For those of us seeking post-capitalist futures: rather than burning ourselves out Doing — the energy of the capitalist system we are trying to topple — why not try Being, the energy of degrowth?
creator: Jane W. Wang
sourceDescription: Insight and inspiration in turbulent times.

title: Plants and the great cognition debate
content: If Calvo is out at the front, all the same, he’s not there on his own. Colleagues in the field also believe that the ‘machine metaphor’ of body and brain is getting in the way of understanding—even preventing us from seeing what’s in the data we see in front of us.
creator: Andrew Curry
sourceDescription: Insight and inspiration in turbulent times.

title: After Decades of Deflection, ExxonMobil Moves to Reshape Global Climate Accounting
content: An ExxonMobil-backed initiative, Carbon Measures, is pushing to reshape how the world does the math on climate change. Their system, outside analysts point out, leaves consumers holding the bag.
creator: Sharon Kelly
sourceDescription: Insight and inspiration in turbulent times.

title: When Water Decides: Securing National Ambitions through the Hydrological Cycle
content: As long as water is treated as a problem to be drained rather than an ally to be welcomed, it will abandon us when we need it most and strike when we are least prepared.
creator: El Habib Ben Amara
sourceDescription: Insight and inspiration in turbulent times.

title: Make America Go Away…from the Deep Ocean
content: So, it’s time we Make America Go Away from the Deep Ocean. Yes, the MAGADO movement. I encourage you to write a public comment and register to speak.
creator: Erik Assadourian
sourceDescription: Insight and inspiration in turbulent times.

title: It’s ecological breakdown that should put us on a war-footing: official
content: Admissions of extreme, eco-caused national security threats foreground importance of climate adaptation to bring much needed urgency and agency.
creator: Caroline Lucas
sourceDescription: Insight and inspiration in turbulent times.

title: Hedging bets on catastrophe
content: It’s not rare for people to be left behind by profit-driven corporations, or even overlooked by underfunded and understaffed government agencies. In that case, we must learn to turn to each other. And in preparation for such times, we must bolster community resilience through initiatives like community gardens, tool libraries, and the like.
creator: Meghan Williams
sourceDescription: Insight and inspiration in turbulent times.

title: If I were the global ruler
content: As large systems strain and loosen, smaller systems already begin to form. People create pockets of care, work, learning and shelter that operate by different rules. These efforts remain partial, local and imperfect, yet they matter.
creator: Charlotte Del Signore
sourceDescription: Insight and inspiration in turbulent times.

title: World oil and natural gas consumption vs discoveries: Diverging trends mean trouble
content: In the oil and natural gas industry it is a truism that you can't produce what you haven't discovered. Here's why current trends are disturbing.
creator: Kurt Cobb
sourceDescription: Insight and inspiration in turbulent times.

title: The Empathy Project
content: Beyond its immediate content, the Empathy Project ricochets out echoes and ripples, negotiating both structures and surfaces: tracing the lines of a whole, out of kilter, system of interconnected, interdependent components that needs realignment, and "empathy" is probably the best way forward.
creator: Chris Rhodes
sourceDescription: Insight and inspiration in turbulent times.

title: Paul and George, in the Machine
content: "The Machine is, rather, a tendency within us … [manifesting] today as an intersection of money, power, state power and increasingly coercive and manipulative technologies, which constitute an ongoing war against roots and against limits … and it will not stop until it has conquered and transformed the world."
creator: Chris Smaje
sourceDescription: Insight and inspiration in turbulent times.
